description:
Hugo was born in Austria but moved to the United States when he was 12. I asked him why his family moved.
"My father got a job here," he replied.
Hmmm. Hugo is kind of quiet and his answers are short. That's OK because he smiles a lot and he's got a hot, muscular, hairy body!
One thing he wasn't shy about was his girlfriend. He loved to talk about her and when I asked him if he had a picture of her, he pulled five of them out of his wallet (she's very pretty)...
"She likes to watch me masturbate," he told me.
Apparently, she waits until he's almost there and then helps him get off.
"She likes to rub the cum in my hair," he said.
"Your pubic hair?"
"Yeah."
"She likes the cum, then?" I teased him
"Yeah."
"Is she a swallower?"
He didn't understand what I meant. When I explained it to him he laughed and said softly, "Oh, yes!"
title: Hugo
